reaction.ranaway2: Якщо ти повернешся, я покличу охоронців!
reaction.ranaway4: Якщо я побачу тебе знову, отримаєш від мене на горіхи!
reaction.ranaway5: Я знав, що ти боїшся мене!
reaction.ranaway6: Чому ти біжи? Повернись сюди аби я міг вдарити тебе!
reaction.ranaway7: Відлупцюю, якщо побачу тебе ще раз!
reaction.ranaway8: Я візьму моїх друзів, і поб'ю вас!
villager.warning1: Я попереджаю вас, не нападайте на наших людей!
villager.hurt6: Гей! Що ж ти думаєш ти робиш?!
villager.badly_hurt1: О, ні! Будь ласка, не роби мені боляче!
villager.badly_hurt5: Ти можеш взяти все, що завгодно, тільки не завдавай мені шкоди, прошу!
villager.badly_hurt6: Я не хочу вмирати! Не наближайся!
villager.sickness1: Я не дуже добре себе почуваю, док...
villager.sickness8: Будь ласка, нехай це буде сон... *кашляє*
spouse.chore.mining.nopick: Я забув свою кирку, люба, ти принесла запасну?
spouse.chore.chopping.noaxe: О, я думав, ми йдемо на пікнік, я не приніс сокиру...
spouse.chore.fishing.norod: Я б із задоволенням! Проте, я не можу знайти свою вудочку.
spouse.chore.hunting.nosword: Я вчора зламав свій меч. У вас є ще один?
spouse.chore.harvesting.nohoe: У вас є зайва мотика, яку я міг би використати?
childp.chore.mining.nopick: Я не можу цього зробити без кирки!
childp.chore.chopping.noaxe: Я не можу рубати деревину без сокири...
childp.chore.fishing.norod: Я не можу рибалити без вудки!
childp.chore.hunting.nosword: Ти можеш мені спочатку дати меч?
childp.chore.harvesting.nohoe: Я не маю мотики для збору врожаю.
child.chore.mining.nopick: Я не можу цього зробити без кирки!
child.chore.chopping.noaxe: Я не можу рубати деревину без сокири...
child.chore.fishing.norod: Я не можу рибалити без вудки!
child.chore.hunting.nosword: Ти можеш мені спочатку дати меч?
adult.chore.hunting.nosword: Я втратив свого меча! У тебе є ще один?
child.interaction.marry.fail.isbaby: Ви намагаєтесь одружитися з дитиною... що?
spouse.interaction.marry.fail.marriedtog: Це гарне кільце, але ми вже одружені, дурнику.
adult.interaction.marry.fail.marriedtoot: Перепрошую, але ні... Я вже одружений.
Ой, я думав, ти знаєш... Я вже одружений.
adult.interaction.marry.fail.playermarri: Я бачу той обручку на вашому пальці. Ви вже одружений!
Що ти намагаєшся зробити? Ти вже одружений!
Що? Правда? Ти хіба вже не одружений?
Цікаво! У вас вже є подружжя.
adult.interaction.marry.fail.lowhearts1: Що? Ні! Ти мені не подобаєшся!
adult.interaction.marry.fail.lowhearts2: О, милий перстень! Ой, зачекайте... це для мене? Ем ні.
adult.interaction.marry.fail.lowhearts3: Це для мене? Вибач, я просто не дуже довго знаю тебе.
adult.interaction.marry.fail.lowhearts4: Я вражений, але чесно кажучи, я тебе не знаю.
adult.interaction.marry.fail.isparent1: Не тримайте це у сім'ї, будь ласка...
adult.interaction.marry.fail.isparent2: Майже впевнений, що це не так.
adult.interaction.marry.fail.isparent3: Згідно з Енциклопедією життя, інцест є незаконним. Тож ні.
spouse.interaction.engage.success1: Так! Я вийду за тебе! Я тебе люблю!
spouse.interaction.engage.success4: Це...Це все насправді? Я маю на увазі пропозицію, а не обручку. Але ж кільце теж справжнє, вірно?
spouse.interaction.marry.success1: Мрії стають дійсністю! Я буду любити тебе вічно!
spouse.interaction.marry.success3: Я щаслива, що одружилась з тобою, %1$s.
spouse.interaction.marry.success4: Я не можу чекати, щоб почати наше життя разом!
adult.interaction.matchmaker.fail.marrie: В мене щасливий шлюб. Мені не потрібен гарем.
Я не хочу цього - Я вже одружений.
adult.interaction.matchmaker.fail.engage: Я вже заручена, я не можу взяти це кільце.
Я обіцяв пов'язати своє життя з іншою людиною.
Дякую, але я думаю, що у мене все гаразд. Я вже дещо з ким у шлюбі.
adult.interaction.matchmaker.fail.needtw: Хіба на весілля потрібно не дві обручки?
Добре! Але тобі потрібні два кільця.
Моїй дружині та мені потрібні 2 кільця, але у вас тільки одне.
adult.interaction.matchmaker.fail.novill: Я нікого не бачу поряд. На кому, на твою думку, мені одружитися?
Я навіть не знаю... посунь мене до того, хто, на твою думку, підходить мені.
Але, здається, поряд нікого немає. На кому мені одружитися?
adult.interaction.sethome.success1: Okay, this will be my new home point.
adult.interaction.sethome.success2: Я розумію, я спатиму тут ночами.
spouse.interaction.sethome.success1: Мені подобається це місце, хороша робота %1$s!
childp.interaction.sethome.success2: Думаю, це добре. Можна піти грати зараз?
childp.interaction.sethome.success3: Гаразд, але я хочу найбільшу кімнату!
interaction.sethome.fail1: This doesn't look like a safe home point for me.
interaction.sethome.bedfail1: Гарний будинок, але всі ліжка, схоже, зайняті.
interaction.sethome.bedfail.infirmary1: This is a infirmary, the bed is reserved for sick people.
interaction.sethome.bedfail.blocked1: This building has been marked as blocked.
adult.interaction.sethangout.success1: Це моє улюблене місце. Я часто буваю тут вечорами.
child.interaction.sethangout.success1: Добре! Я пограю тут перед сном.
childp.interaction.sethangout.success1: Добре! Я пограю тут перед сном.
spouse.interaction.gohome.success1: Звичайно, любий, я зараз піду додому.
child.interaction.gohome.success1: Добре! Здається, я згадав, де живу...
spouse.interaction.gohome.fail.nohome: Нагадай мені ще раз, де був наш дім?
child.interaction.gohome.fail.nohome: Я не пам'ятаю, де я живу...
childp.interaction.gohome.fail.nohome: Я не пам'ятаю, де дім! Ми переїжджаємо занадто багато!
childp.interaction.ridehorse.fail.notnea: Де мій кінь? Сподіваюся, я не загубив його знову...
adult.interaction.ridehorse.fail.notnear: Я не бачу коней, де можна поїхати, поблизу.
spouse.interaction.ridehorse.fail.notnea: Where is my horse, dear? I can't find it.
spouse.interaction.procreate.fail.hasbab: We already have a baby... you didn't lose it did you?!
...ти втратив малюка Джобі чи не так? Почекай... хіба його звали Джобі?
spouse.interaction.procreate.fail.lostba: Ти втратила нашу дитину?!? О, він тут, дурненька.
Наші сусіди знайшли нашу дитину. Будь ласка, будь обережнішим.
That is the last time I search for our baby!
spouse.interaction.procreate.fail.lowhea: Spend more time with me! I'm not ready for a child.
Хм... поки що ні. Думаю, спочатку нам треба провести більше часу разом.
interaction.adopt.success: That's my happiest day of my life!
armor.enabled: Okay, I will always wear my armor. If I have any.
armor.disabled: Добре, я надягну зброю тільки на випадок, якщо на нас нападуть.
profession.set.none: Добре, я скоро знайду свою роботу.
profession.set.guard: I am honored to serve as a guard protecting this village.
profession.set.archer: Я братиму участь у захисті села як лучник.
adult.gift.cake.success1: Що це? Торт? Ой...О боже мій. Мені...треба знайти свого чоловіка.
adult.gift.cake.success2: Тортик! Яка турбота! Я...хвилинку, що це за дивне почуття?
adult.gift.cake.fail1: Я не думаю, що я хочу більше торта, але дякую.
adult.gift.cake.fail2: Ні, дякую, я не хочу більше торта.
gift.confectionary.fail2: Я впевнений, що пекарю сподобалося б це більше.
child.gift.confectionary.fail: Мама сказала, що мені не можна солодощі...
gift.gluten.fail: Там є глютен, ти хочеш, щоб я мав діарею до кінця року?
gift.meats.fail2: You know that I hate meat!
gift.lactose.fail: Вибачте, але я не переношу лактозу.
gift.flowers.good2: Сподіваюся, що ти не збирав це в моєму саду
gift.fish.fail2: This is strange even for you.
gift.fish.fail3: A fish. You gave me. A fish. Why?
gift.fish.good1: This will save me some time. Thank you.
gift.fish.better: Wow. You spent all that time just for me?
gift.fish.best2: This is just what I needed!
colors.fail: Я сліпий. Що мені з цим робити?
gift.weapons.fail1: Я не думаю, що можу, вибачте
gift.weapons.fail4: Я краще з мотикою ніж мечем
child.gift.weapons.success2: Чекай, поки %Supporter% не побачить мене з ЦИМ!
gift.weapons.success3: Я добре заточу його, шукач пригод.
gift.plant.fail1: It's lovely, but I don't know what to do with it.
gift.plant.fail2: Why don't you give this to the farmer?
gift.plant.best2: This is just what I needed!
gift.plant.best4: This will fit perfectly next to the shrubs.
adult.gift.fail2: What made you think that I would like this?
adult.gift.fail4: I don't want that, why would I?
adult.gift.fail5: Why are you giving me that?
adult.gift.fail6: Is this supposed to be a gift? No thanks.
adult.gift.good5: A gift? For me? How nice!
adult.gift.better4: Oh wow, I actually needed one of these!
adult.gift.better5: This is a pretty good gift!
adult.gift.best1: Я...Я не знаю навіть, що сказати. Величезне вам спасибі, %1$s!
adult.gift.best2: How did you...nevermind, this is amazing!
adult.gift.best3: Oh wow, I've always wanted one of these!
adult.gift.best4: This is fantastic! I'll put it to good use.
adult.gift.best5: Дуже вам дякую, я буду пам'ятати це назавжди.
child.gift.fail3: Навіщо ти мені це приніс? Це безглуздо!
child.gift.fail4: Я навіть не знаю, що це таке!
child.gift.better1: Чудово! Я маю намір показати це всім своїм друзям.
child.gift.better2: Ви знайшли! Я втратив це кілька хвилин тому.
child.gift.better3: Мій друг вкрав у мене одну з них. Ти побив його за мене?
child.gift.best2: Нарешті! Тепер мій друг перестане хвалитися.
child.gift.best3: Ух ти! Де ти дістав цю штуку?
child.gift.best4: У мого батька є такий самий. Тепер у мене також є такий!
spouse.gift.fail2: Um, is this supposed to be a gift for me?
spouse.gift.fail3: Викиньте свій власний мотлох! О, це був подарунок? Пробачте.
spouse.gift.fail4: Я думала, ти знаєш мене краще. Я ненавиджу це.
spouse.gift.good2: Ah! You're too good to me.
spouse.gift.good3: This is unexpected, thank you, dear!
spouse.gift.better1: Oh wow, this is actually really nice!
spouse.gift.better4: You got this for me? How sweet!
spouse.gift.best2: You are *way* too good to me!
spouse.gift.best3: Це має бути дуже дорого! Спасибі!
spouse.gift.best4: Я... не можу повірити, що ти подарував мені щось таке продумане!
childp.gift.fail2: Ew, I've gotten so much better before!
childp.gift.fail3: Didn't you give me this like, last year?
childp.gift.fail4: I could get this easily, no thanks.
childp.gift.good2: Is it my birthday? This is awesome!
childp.gift.good3: This is much better than the last gift I got!
childp.gift.good4: Woo hoo! It's mine, all mine!
childp.gift.better3: I really like this one, can I have another?
childp.gift.better4: All of my friends will be jealous now!
childp.gift.better5: Це так круто! Я давно мріяла про таке!
childp.gift.best2: Я знала, що ти подаруєш мені одну з них. Я знала!
childp.gift.best3: Ура! У мене найкращі батьки у світі!
childp.gift.best4: Це так дивно! Я не можу повірити, що це все!
childp.gift.best5: Thank you so much! You're the best ever!
spouse.endmarriage1: З мене досить. Ти недостатньо добре до мене ставишся. Я йду від тебе!
spouse.endmarriage2: Я їду. Назавжди! Не шукай мене.
spouse.endmarriage3: Мені шкода – я думав, що ми зможемо налагодити стосунки, але в мене нічого не виходить. Прощавай.
spouse.endmarriage4: %1$s, це прощання. Не намагайся стежити за мною.
adult.dialogue.main4: What's going on with you today?
spouse.dialogue.main1: Hi honey, where have you been?
spouse.dialogue.main2: Hello dear, how is your day going?
spouse.dialogue.main4: Hey %1$s! You look hungry. Would you like me to cook something?
adult.dialogue.hug.success3: At least one thing made my day today.
adult.dialogue.hug.success4: You're as snuggly as a sheep!
adult.dialogue.hug.fail1: You're covered in soot and mud!
adult.dialogue.hug.fail4: After you called me a dinosaur last week? No.
adult.dialogue.hug.fail5: Відверто кажучи, ти не заслуговуєш на обійми після того, як ти це зробив.
spouse.dialogue.hug.success1: I love being entangled in your arms!
spouse.dialogue.hug.success3: Що б ти вибрав, мати можливість лише обійматися чи цілуватися?
spouse.dialogue.hug.fail1: Why don't you go hug your ex?
childp.dialogue.hug.success2: Якось я стану таким же сильним, як ти!
childp.dialogue.hug.success4: I love hugs! You're soft and warm!
childp.dialogue.hug.fail2: Stop it! I don't want people to see!
childp.dialogue.hug.fail4: Просто дай мені спокій або дай мені печеньки!
adult.dialogue.kiss.success1: I wish this moment would last forever.
spouse.dialogue.kiss.success1: I fall in love all over again when our lips meet!
spouse.dialogue.kiss.success2: Time stops ticking when I'm with you.
spouse.dialogue.kiss.success5: I wouldn't trade you for anyone in the world!
spouse.dialogue.kiss.fail1: Not where someone can see us...
spouse.dialogue.kiss.fail2: We don't have to if you don't want to.
spouse.dialogue.kiss.fail3: Your breath smells like wolf kibble.
spouse.dialogue.kiss.fail4: Go take a drink from the lake.
spouse.dialogue.kiss.fail5: Now that we're married I can tell you how lousy you are at kissing.
adult.dialogue.chat.success1: Man, cookies and milk does sound delicious right now.
adult.dialogue.chat.success2: Yes, I suppose the weather is nice today.
adult.dialogue.chat.success3: I'm doing just fine! Hit my toe when I woke up, though.
adult.dialogue.chat.success4: An apple a day keeps the zombies away!
adult.dialogue.chat.success5: My dream is to build my own village, but I'm so lazy.
adult.dialogue.chat.success6: I think I saw %Supporter% the other day in Diamond armor.
adult.dialogue.chat.success7: My friend %Supporter% told me that they found a chest full of diamonds yesterday!
adult.dialogue.chat.fail1: Did you seriously just say that?
adult.dialogue.chat.fail2: I don't believe it exploded on its own.
adult.dialogue.chat.fail3: You know, you're not that cool.
adult.dialogue.chat.fail5: You should be thrown in a dungeon!
child.dialogue.chat.success1: I heard stories about you! Are you a hero?
child.dialogue.chat.success2: Hi. I was going to go try and climb to the roof.
child.dialogue.chat.success3: Do you wanna go burn stuff with me?
child.dialogue.chat.success4: I'm going to be a hunter like you and kill many things!
child.dialogue.chat.success5: Hi! What are you doing today? I'm going swimmin'!
child.dialogue.chat.fail1: If you don't give me cookies I'll hold my breath.
child.dialogue.chat.fail2: My parents said not to talk to you, that you're bad.
child.dialogue.chat.fail4: Oh yeah? Well I'm gonna egg your house!
spouse.dialogue.chat.success1: I cleaned the entire house. How was your day?
spouse.dialogue.chat.success2: Honey, let's go camping sometime. Doesn't that sound like fun?
spouse.dialogue.chat.success3: So today I saw a spider. It was huge so I ran away.
spouse.dialogue.chat.success4: We should build a new house together!
spouse.dialogue.chat.success5: I almost walked into a lava pit the other day. That wouldn't have been good!
spouse.dialogue.chat.fail1: I know we're not the poorest family, but...
spouse.dialogue.chat.fail2: I love being around you but I need some space.
spouse.dialogue.chat.fail3: Sometimes I wish I had my own "cave" to escape from you and everyone.
spouse.dialogue.chat.fail4: Go away, I'm not in the mood.
spouse.dialogue.chat.fail5: Where have you been? Are you seeing someone behind my back?
childp.dialogue.chat.success1: Oh, I was just going to go explorin' later.
childp.dialogue.chat.success3: Hi, can you make me a cake?
childp.dialogue.chat.success4: Can I have my own room away from our house? That would be cool!
childp.dialogue.chat.success5: Let's move into a cave! That sounds so fun!
childp.dialogue.chat.fail2: I don't think I'd like that very much.
childp.dialogue.chat.fail3: Is that why I've heard so much about "divorce"? What does that mean?
childp.dialogue.chat.fail5: I don't want a baby sister.
adult.dialogue.story.success1: Really? I can't believe that all happened!
adult.dialogue.story.success2: I wish I was brave enough to take on a creeper.
adult.dialogue.story.success3: That was a really good story! Is it original?
adult.dialogue.story.success4: All of that happened yesterday? No way!
adult.dialogue.story.success5: I was near there yesterday, I can't believe I didn't hear this already.
adult.dialogue.story.success6: Haha! That definitely sounds like %Supporter%! Such an awesome person.
adult.dialogue.story.success7: I've heard the Legend of %Supporter% almost a million times. Tell me again!
adult.dialogue.story.fail1: *Ahem* That's my mother you're talking about.
adult.dialogue.story.fail2: This is why the village talks about you.
adult.dialogue.story.fail4: You're terrible! Creepers have feelings too!
adult.dialogue.story.fail5: How could you kill a poor sheep?!
child.dialogue.story.success2: I want to be just like you when I grow up. Shh, don't tell dad.
child.dialogue.story.success3: Can you adopt me?! You're awesome!
child.dialogue.story.success4: I went fishing and almost drowned.
child.dialogue.story.success5: Does this mean I can take whatever I want? I mean, "borrow?"
child.dialogue.story.fail2: I'm telling my mom what you said about her...
child.dialogue.story.fail3: I believe you're speaking about my grandpa...
child.dialogue.story.fail4: You're nothing but a scaredycat like dad said!
child.dialogue.story.fail5: How could you kill a poor chicken?
spouse.dialogue.story.success1: Let's not tell our children that one...
spouse.dialogue.story.success2: You were so rebellious! I love it!
spouse.dialogue.story.success3: Did you ever tell your parents about losing their rings?
spouse.dialogue.story.success4: It was that moment when I fell in love with you!
spouse.dialogue.story.success5: Wow, you're the best hunter ever!
spouse.dialogue.story.fail1: Talk to me when you kill something other than a harmless cow.
spouse.dialogue.story.fail3: You have a family to think about!
spouse.dialogue.story.fail4: ...If you liked them why didn't you marry them, instead?
spouse.dialogue.story.fail5: Why did you wear the pink fluffy underwear? Whose were they?
childp.dialogue.story.success1: What!? You really did that?! But...what happened to your friend?
childp.dialogue.story.success2: I want to explore a cave, too! Let's go!
childp.dialogue.story.success3: One day I'll kill more creepers than you!
childp.dialogue.story.success4: Oh, oh, oh! Can we climb a tree, too?!
childp.dialogue.story.fail1: I don't want to hear about grandma.
childp.dialogue.story.fail2: You always say that. I just want a pet.
childp.dialogue.story.fail3: You're just fibbing. I don't belive that.
childp.dialogue.story.fail4: You said you didn't eat the cake and cookies...
childp.dialogue.story.fail5: Someone said you were a bad person, and I believe them!
adult.dialogue.flirt.success2: Oh, you! Stop being so cute!
adult.dialogue.flirt.success5: That was so adorable! You had me at "hello"!
adult.dialogue.flirt.fail1: If you mean that, then prove it.
adult.dialogue.flirt.fail2: Aw.... Wait, you told the baker the same thing!
adult.dialogue.flirt.fail5: A zombie has a better chance than you.
spouse.dialogue.flirt.success1: *Blushes* Well, how about we do something like that, then!
spouse.dialogue.flirt.success2: Aw, you said that when we first met.
spouse.dialogue.flirt.fail2: This one is getting old... like you.
spouse.dialogue.flirt.fail3: We're married, we don't have to do this anymore.
spouse.dialogue.flirt.fail4: Talk to the tree, it cares more.
spouse.dialogue.flirt.fail5: Yeah, yeah... What was it you were saying?
dialogue.joke.skeleton.failed: Skeletons are sentient beings! How dare you!
dialogue.joke.sheep.success1: Unfortunate for the sheep to lose its wool, but funny!
dialogue.joke.sheep.success2: Then the wolf fell in love with the sheep.
dialogue.joke.sheep.failed1: That poor sheep! That's not funny at all!
dialogue.joke.pig.failed1: Don't speak about my pig like that!
dialogue.joke.creative.success3: That's the best I have ever heard!
dialogue.joke.creative.failed3: Ah, you're not the funniest in town.
child.dialogue.joke.creative.success4: I'm tellin' my momma that one! *Laughs*
spouse.dialogue.joke.creative.success1: *Laughs* I married you for your humor!
spouse.dialogue.joke.creative.success2: You should throw an egg at him next time!
spouse.dialogue.joke.creative.success4: Here's one for you... How many chickens does a creeper blow up?
spouse.dialogue.joke.creative.fail4: You need to erase that from your mind.
childp.dialogue.joke.creative.success2: I've got to tell my friend that one!
childp.dialogue.joke.creative.success4: *Laughs*Why is there no longer 3 of them?
childp.dialogue.joke.creative.fail1: I thought you were funny, though...
childp.dialogue.joke.creative.fail2: I like knock knock jokes better.
childp.dialogue.joke.creative.fail3: I don't get it, that was dumb.
childp.dialogue.joke.creative.fail4: *Yawn* My friend's dad is cooler and funnier than you.
dialogue.greet.greet_0: Hey! How are you doing today?
dialogue.greet.getBetter1: Aww, I hope whatever you're dealing with gets better
_comment: I suggest integrating hand shaking, high five etc into greet
adult.shake_hand.success2: Your grip shows me you have great power!
adult.shake_hand.fail1: Seriously? After you slaughtered the cow?
adult.shake_hand.fail3: I'm not a stranger, you don't have to be so polite.
adult.shake_hand.fail4: Wow really? This isn't like you.
child.shake_hand.success1: Hiya! Someone I know likes you...
child.shake_hand.success2: Dad said this is a very nice thing to do.
child.shake_hand.success3: Now high five! Down low... too slow!
child.shake_hand.success5: *Giggles* I just cleaned a cow with this hand.
child.shake_hand.fail2: Mom, dad! This person is trying to kidnap me!
child.shake_hand.fail4: Ew, your hand has black stuff on it.
child.shake_hand.fail5: I'll only shake your hand if you give me a diamond.
spouse.shake_hand.success3: One day people will forget to shake hands.
spouse.shake_hand.success4: Our children will need to be this polite.
spouse.shake_hand.success5: *Continues to shake hand* Tell me when to stop!
spouse.shake_hand.fail1: shake_hand? How about a kiss, instead?
spouse.shake_hand.fail3: Your hand is nasty, no way.
spouse.shake_hand.fail5: Why don't you get a decent job instead of shaking my hand?
childp.shake_hand.success1: Why do I need to learn this stuff?
childp.shake_hand.success2: I heard that this is a polite thing to do.
childp.shake_hand.success3: I'm gonna be just like you when I grow up!
childp.shake_hand.success5: I don't get it, but okay!
childp.shake_hand.fail4: I'll shake your hand if you give me cake.
childp.shake_hand.fail5: No, you'll slip and hit me.
dialogue.divorce: Do you really want a divorce? A cleric can provide divorce papers to decrease penalties.
dialogue.procreate: Do you really want a child?
dialogue.adopt: Do you really want to be my parent?
dialogue.divorcePapers: Here you go, bring these papers to your spouse to confirm the divorce.
